title: Hymen's præludia, or, Loves master-piece being the sixth part of that so much admir'd romance intituled Cleopatra / written originally in French and now rendred into English by I.C.
author: La Calprenède, Gaultier de Coste, seigneur de, d. 1663.
publisher: Printed by F. Leach for R. Lowndes,
notes: A translation of part 6 of La Calprenède's Cléopâtre. Loveday translated parts 1-3; the remainder were translated by John Coles, James Webb, & John Davies.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
